title: x/mobile/misc/androidstudio: gobind plugin fails with 'no Go tool on $PATH' error
body:
I changed my exposed Go functions names, and then run again
./gomobile bind -target=android testgolibrary

but the .aar library doesn't seem to include the changes
I even tried importing the .aar file from a fresh Android project, and it still reports the old functions

I then renamed the Go package and created a new library with the new package name
./gomobile bind -target=android testgolibrary2
I imported it from the Android project and this time I would see the new functions


Using MacOS
